p: Acetylthiocholine iodide, S-butyrylthiocholine iodide, donepezil, galantamine, catechin, gallic acid, 2,2â€²-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), Folin-Ciocalteu reagent, Tris-HCl, and Triton X-100 were procured from Sigma-Aldrich, India. Gallic acid, aluminum chloride, ammonium molybdate, and potassium ferricyanide were procured from Merck, India. Methanol, ethyl acetate, chloroform, and petroleum ether were from Active Fine Limited, Dhaka, Bangladesh. Unless mentioned, all of the chemicals used in this study were of analytical grade.
